ya9.3:3.1: ⇒ Yo kusalaṃ dhammaṃ bhāveti so akusalaṃ dhammaṃ pajahatīti?
ya9.3:4.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana akusalaṃ dhammaṃ pajahati so kusalaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetīti?
ya9.3:5.1: ⇒ Yo kusalaṃ dhammaṃ na bhāveti so akusalaṃ dhammaṃ nappajahatīti?
ya9.3:6.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana akusalaṃ dhammaṃ nappajahati so kusalaṃ dhammaṃ na bhāvetīti?
